text: Wilhelm Hugo Sperrle, also known as Hugo Sperrle, was a German military aviator in World War I and a Generalfeldmarschall in the Luftwaffe during World War II. Sperrle joined the Imperial German Army in 1903. He served in the artillery upon the outbreak of World War I. Category:German military personnel of World War I Category:German military personnel of World War II Category:German aviators
title: Hugo Sperrle
